mapper.select: select srre.*,su1.actual_name as create_name,su1.tel as create_tel,so.name as organization_name, su2.actual_name as organization_leading_name,su2.tel as organization_leading_tel, su3.actual_name as maintenance_staff_name,su3.tel as maintenance_staff_tel, so2.name as maintenance_staff_organization_name from sys_user as su1,sys_report_repair_engineering as srre LEFT JOIN sys_organization as so on srre.organization_id = so.name LEFT JOIN sys_user as su2 on so.leading_id = su2.id LEFT JOIN sys_user as su3 on srre.maintenance_staff = su3.id LEFT JOIN sys_organization as so2 on su3.organization_id = so2.id where srre.create_id = su1.id and srre.id = #{repairEngineeringId}
